overview: Mrs. Hollywood shows her where to put the cigar. Poor little Demi finds herself kidnapped, drugged, and left naked somewhere in Central America. Naked with no passport, this little babysitter has to fuck her way home. Lexi Arrives at her new babysitting job to discover the kid's father is a workout instructor. But this workout was different. In the aerobics class at the gym she didn't have a cock shoved in her mouth. Melanie's boyfriend catches her cheating on him while babysitting. Melanie has to give up both her holes at once to keep the boys from fighting. Now that's using your head!
tagline: Hire them to sit on your prick!
title: The Babysitter 11
